attributes.action: Citizens at the age of 16 should have a say in the European referendum.
attributes.background: Young people should have a say to weather they would like to be apart of the EU ; this referendum will effect this generation the most. The referendum will dictate the future of this contry and young people have different views on the likes of immigration. Why should our voices be silenced?

rejection.details: It's not clear how you would like young people to be able to have their say.  You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like to happen.
